definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: We have written the compatibility equation in a form that corresponds with the polar geometry.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经把协调方程写成了极坐标的形式。

sentences.english: The FPGA implementation scheme of LPT is also discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 给出了对数极坐标变换的FPGA实现方案。

sentences.english: Let's check what we had for polar coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 我们来回顾一下极坐标。

sentences.english: And lofting with polar coordinates method can break through localization of deflection angle method.
sentences.chinese: 使用极坐标法放样可以避免偏角法的局限性。

sentences.english: With examples, this article attempts to explain the method of polar coordinates and its application in conic .
sentences.chinese: 结合实例，阐述了极坐标法在圆锥曲线中的运用。

sentences.english: The displacement solution is constructed by applying the methods of complex function and multi polar coordinates system.
sentences.chinese: 利用复变函数和多极坐标方法构造了问题的位移解。

sentences.english: An approximately polar formatting algorithm is proposed to compensate scatter migration through resolution cells.
sentences.chinese: 为校正越距离单元走动，提出了一种近似极坐标算法。

sentences.english: The mesh equations of gears are given by tangent polar coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了切线极坐标下的齿轮啮合方程式。

definition: modulus (distance from the origin in polar coordinates)
